Articles.Content:
hi all i just started playing the demo version and have downloaded the mechjeb and mechjeb 2.0 to try and orbit my first craft..

am having trouble with accessing the mechjeb..

when i go t oaccess mj from the save tab

i get the following

craft loading error becuase of the following

missing parts

mumech.mechjeb.pod2.

multi.mechjeb.pod2.

.. mechjeb.pod.tank.

..mechjeb.pod.engine.

...mechjeb.pod.leg.

...mechjeb.pod.lockdown.

when i look in the partsfolder in ksp.. i see they are within it..

so i cannot understand what the prob is..

i could use some one with more expertise in this field..

many thanks

The demo does not support the use of Plugins.

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
